summary: TAKATA RECALL, I RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF THIS RECALL OVER A YEAR AGO.  MAY OF 2016.  I LIVE IN A HOT, HUMID AREA.  TOYOTA SUGGESTS THAT NO ONE RIDE IN MY PASSENGER SEAT.  AM I REALLY NOT SUPPOSED TO LET ANYONE RIDE IN MY FRONT SEAT FOR OVER A YEAR?  I REALIZE THIS IS A LARGE RECALL. BUT I DO NOT PLAN TO GET RID OF MY 4RUNNER ANY TIME SOON.  HOW LONG IS THIS SUPPOSED TO TAKE?
